description:
After overcoming the monster assault Taichi and the others are visited by a messenger from the Royal Family. Alsena, the emissary acting on behalf of Gilmar, King of Elistain Magic Kingdom, asks for their help. The Royal Capital, Wennifix, is currently divided between those supporting the King who`s put great effort into diplomacy and those supporting his younger brother who opposes him. With tensions so high, a civil war is imminent.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 王都ウェネーフィクス
